translations: 使转染；使细胞感染病毒核酸

sentences.sentence: Human CD3AK cells were transfected by viral supernatant.
sentences.translation: 用病毒上清感染人CD3AK细胞。

sentences.sentence: Retrovirus vector; Stable transfected cell line; Stem cells.
sentences.translation: 逆转录病毒；稳定转染；干细胞。

sentences.sentence: We also showed that the IRF-7 was localized mainly in the cytoplasm of transfected 293t cells.
sentences.translation: 使用该抗体证实，转染293t细胞后表达的IRF - 7主要分布在细胞质内。
